**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 280 2.0 **Price** 425 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- This simple iron staff is capped with a faceted, clear gem. **Activate** Interact; **Effect** The gem at the top of the staff glows as a torch, shedding bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 20 feet) for 10 minutes. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect**
  • **Cantrip** [_light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=171)
  • **2nd** [_everlight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1518)
  • **3rd** [_everlight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1518), [_holy light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1557)
**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
